officers.title: President
officers.name: Chloe Hesskamp
officers.bio: I am a senior undergraduate student at CSU studying computer science and mathematics.  I became interested in cybersecurity through math and am especially interested in quantum-resistant cryptography and various applications of abstract algebra.  When I am not programming, I enjoy reading.
responsibilities: Lead meetings and delegate tasks to officers

officers.title: Vice President
officers.name: Enzo Barret
officers.bio: Hello! I'm a senior music performance major at CSU (trumpet) and a CS double major. I love all things cyber security and enjoy being a member of this club. Some of by other hobbies include photography, music, and sailing.
responsibilities: Lead meetings and delegate tasks to officers

officers.title: Secretary
officers.name: Tyler Rios
officers.bio: I am a senior undergraduate majoring in Computer Science. My main interests are firmware and cybersecurity, especially the development of software security tools. I am currently a part of the Division of IT's Cybersecurity and Privacy Student Internship.

officers.title: Treasurer
officers.name: Eric Martin
officers.bio: I am a 2nd Bachelors candidate pursuing a degree in Computer Science. My interests include software engineering, cybersecurity, and blockchain. Previously I was a professional chemist in the cannabis space.

officers.title: Support Officer
officers.name: Britta Maher
officers.bio: I am an undergraduate senior majoring in Computer Science at CSU. I participated in many different technology clubs such as Cyber Patriot and the First Tech Challenge during high school, and discovered my interest in cyber security through Cyber Patriot and Girls Go Cyber. I continued my pursuit of cybersecurity by joining Hashdump. I spend a lot of my free time going to hackathons, online conferences, reading or taking care of my plants.
